Text: Uploaded several copies so far.  Still plenty of bandwidth available if anyone wants a copy.
Up to almost 30 seeds.  Well done everyone.  Keep up the good work, and enjoy the series!

I must say I am very happy with this one.  I am downloading/watching via my Android Thunderbolt and it comes in crisp on my Act 1 video player paid version.  The trial act 1 took longer to buffer, but the paid is quick.  The download time for the torrent as a whole was a bit long on my phone, but  it was easily fixed by downloading one file in the background while watching the one prior.  I tried Lunar version first and wasn't happy at all. If you want quality than please download this and SEED SEED SEED!
